allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add reanalyze button to report display

Adds an orange "Reanalyze" button to the results display that re-runs the analysis with the same parameters \(keyword, target URL, and model\) without reloading the page. This provides a quick way to get fresh results while preserving the analysis context.

The button appears between "Download Report" and "New Analysis" buttons.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
